content.description: The images show the sika dwa kofi (Golden Stool) and the Nkisi n’kondi.
content.question: In its intended setting, the Power figure (Nkisi n’kondi) likely instilled a sense of confidence in members of the community because it

choices.label: equalized the social position of all members of the society
ensured punishment for those who broke oaths or committed crimes
guided young men to show respect for elder men and women
ensured prosperity for families who made offerings in its presence

content.answer: ensured punishment for those who broke oaths or committed crimes

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
